allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add LLM-powered test generation with template fallback

Major changes:
- Add LLM mode for intelligent test generation (production)
- Add template mode for CI without LLM access (use_llm=False)
- Delete deprecated workflows: docker_deployment.py, maven_maintenance.py, test_generation.py
- Add CONTEXT.md for project documentation

Test generation now uses LLM by default:
- generate_adaptive_tests(use_llm=True) - LLM-powered tests
- generate_adaptive_tests(use_llm=False) - Template-based tests

Fallback: If LLM fails, automatically uses template generation.

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash("c:/Users/jfran/axtion/TestBoost/.venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "
import requests
import json

BASE = ''http://localhost:8000''

# API-S01: Create session
print\(''=== API-S01: Create Session ===''\)
r = requests.post\(f''{BASE}/api/v2/sessions'', json={
    ''project_path'': ''test-projects/spring-petclinic-microservices'',
    ''session_type'': ''test_generation'',
    ''mode'': ''interactive''
}, headers={''X-API-Key'': ''test-key''}\)
print\(f''Status: {r.status_code}''\)
print\(f''Response: {json.dumps\(r.json\(\), indent=2\)[:500]}''\)
")

Bash("c:/Users/jfran/axtion/TestBoost/.venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "
import requests
import json

BASE = ''http://localhost:8000''
API_KEY = ''your-api-key-here''

# API-M01: Metrics endpoint \(correct path\)
print\(''=== API-M01: Metrics Endpoint ===''\)
r = requests.get\(f''{BASE}/metrics/json'', headers={''X-API-Key'': API_KEY}\)
print\(f''Status: {r.status_code}''\)
if r.status_code == 200:
    print\(f''Response: {json.dumps\(r.json\(\), indent=2\)[:800]}''\)
else:
    print\(f''Response: {r.text}''\)

# Test steps endpoints
print\(\)
print\(''=== API-S05: Session Steps ===''\)
# Create a session first
r1 = requests.post\(f''{BASE}/api/v2/sessions'', json={
    ''project_path'': ''test-projects/spring-petclinic-microservices'',
    ''session_type'': ''maven_maintenance'',
    ''mode'': ''interactive''
}, headers={''X-API-Key'': API_KEY}\)

if r1.status_code == 201:
    session_id = r1.json\(\).get\(''id''\)
    
    # Get steps
    r2 = requests.get\(f''{BASE}/api/v2/sessions/{session_id}/steps'', headers={''X-API-Key'': API_KEY}\)
    print\(f''Get Steps Status: {r2.status_code}''\)
    print\(f''Steps: {json.dumps\(r2.json\(\), indent=2\)[:400]}''\)
")
